website_summaries.verdict: Excellent value if you want active noise cancelling. The FreeBuds 3i also sound great, but battery life is on the short side.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves them! I've given them a go too, great quality for the size, they stay in your ears really well too. Great convenience with the charging case.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Walker

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Surprised how good these are, a little bigger than expected but anc is very good on this price mark. Over all very happy. Used on android and iPhone with no problems so far
customer_reviews.author: Keith Faithfull

customer_reviews.title: No Wires
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend and as far as I know he loves them. They arrived on time and in good condition 😄
customer_reviews.author: weejimmy

customer_reviews.title: Good performance
customer_reviews.text: Great all around with one exception. The housing unit was assembled slightly off and is not smooth on the right earbud and catches against my skin in the ear from time to time
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfy earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfy earbuds. Good sound with noise cancellation on. Connect quickly. Taps work OK. Good range from Bluetooth unit.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbin

customer_reviews.title: Earphones
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, good connection within a reasonable distance. Nice and compact with good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds really good, noise cancelling is decent but not great, battery last around 2.5 hours with volume at 80%,good value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Dumea Iulian

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing battery life
customer_reviews.text: The buds look solidly made and the audio quality is very good, the noise cancelling is very good too. It loses stars due to the battery life they run out of charge after about 2.5 to 3 hrs maximum disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Whitby

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of wireless earbuds for the price
customer_reviews.text: They’re a little bit larger than standard in ear pods, but they generally fit quite well, the battery life is on par with other pairs this size and the sound quality is above average at this price range. The noise cancellation is a huge plus, especially considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great item with real-deal noise cancellation. Stay in ear nicely; has alternative tips. Fast and courteous service from seller - RND Tech.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

product_meta.title: HUAWEI FreeBuds 3i - Wireless Earbuds with Ultimate Active Noise Cancellation (3-mic System Earphones, Fast Bluetooth Connection, 10mm Speaker, Pop to Pair), White, One
feature_bullets: 3-mic System: HUAWEI FreeBuds 3i comes with two outward-facing mics to accurately pick up your voice while avoiding other environmental noises, and a third inward-facing mic receives the voice conducted inside your ears to further enhance call quality. Everything you say is clear regardless of the noises

Petit Size, Mighty Sound: With HUAWEI FreeBuds 3i's highly-sensitive diaphragm carefully tuned to deliver authentic, balanced audio and the 10 mm large dynamic drivers delivering powerful bass, you will feel the brilliance of every note in your ears

Fill Your Day with Music: One single charge offers up to 3.5 hours of listening pleasure, while the charging case delivers 14.5 hours of battery life that will fill your day with musical joy.* *Data are based on the test results of Huawei labs

Ultimate Active Noise Cancellation: While the outward-facing mic is detecting ambient noise to actively counter with the anti-noise, the inward-facing mic is picking up the rest noise in your ears for further cancellation. HUAWEI FreeBuds 3i offers a thorough noise-cancelling experience for your immersive enjoyment

Pop to Pair, Ready to Start: Pair HUAWEI FreeBuds 3i automatically with the pop-up window* when the charging case is open, and you are good to go. Battery status is also visible when pairing. Instantly enjoy your favorite music. *Pop-up window only adapts to Huawei smartphones with EMUI10 or above

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
